title: I need a Detective!
body:
I seem to have acquired 32 ability power, yet there was none in my masteries/runes, and i have no items or buffs that give me any.
So i ask you: Where did i get this ability power?


{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} 


Is it a bug with Shen? I played with another Shen who had 34 AP and he had no items/buffs either (but i don't know what his masteries were)

replies.body: Blue buff gives +2 AP/lvl and you have Dragon.
when did blue buff give ap?

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n8rTBnEE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-31T11:35:40.068+0000)
>
> when did blue buff give ap?

A few patches ago. Patch 5.22.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=n8rTBnEE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-31T11:35:40.068+0000)
>
> when did blue buff give ap?

no idea, but it does.
